description.title: About device
text: Motorola XOOM with Wi-Fi has a super-powerful dual-core processor and Android™ 3.0 (Honeycomb) — the Android platform designed specifically for tablets. With its 10.1-inch HD widescreen display, you’ll enjoy HD video in a thin, light, powerful and upgradeable tablet.

description.title: Shoot it. Flip it. Zoom it. Crop it. Cut it. Light it. Tweak it. Love it.
text: battery: standbyTime - 336 hours, talkTime: 24 hours, Other ( mAH)
Sensors: proximity, ambient light, barometer, gyroscope
